message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a method for improving the performance of simple models using information from complex models, which is a common problem in machine learning and falls under the category of "Machine Learning" (cs.LG). The method involves attaching probes to intermediate layers of a neural network, which is a technique commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the use of loss functions such as cross-entropy loss, least squares loss, and hinge loss, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and data science (cs.DS). Finally, the paper leverages per sample hardness estimates, which is a concept commonly used in neural networks (cs.NE).
